phrases.phrase: All messages from the other tickets will be merged into this ticket.
All selected tickets are already in the destination department. Please select another department.
The tickets you have selected are located in more than one department. Tickets will only be updated if the chosen prefix is valid in its department.
If this option is disabled, the captcha will be required with both users and anonymous guest
Prevent board send an email about new contact.
If selected, users will be required to select a prefix when creating or editing a ticket. This will not be enforced for moderators.
It is not possible to move any of the selected messages to the specified target.
The following articles were found in the knowledge base which may answer your question. Please review the suggestions before submission.
{replier} opened a new ticket for you at {board}.
Thank you for contacting our support team. A support ticket has now been opened for your request. You will be notified when a response is made by email. The details of your ticket are shown below.
No knowledge bases have been added to this category yet.
No knowledge bases have been added yet.
No predefined replies have been added to this group yet.
No predefined replies have been added yet.
No ticket could be found with the ID {support_ticket_id}.
No ticket ID could be found from that URL.
No ticket prefixes are available for the specified departments.
No tickets have been created yet.
Note that the ticket starter will see this alert even if they can no longer view their ticket.
Notify members watching the destination department
Notify ticket starter of this action.
Please confirm that you want to close the following
Please confirm that you want to remove the following member
Predefined replies belonging to this group will be disassociated, rather than deleted.

You may use these placeholders:
[TICKET_USER] - the ticket submitter's name.
[BOARD_TITLE] - the board title.
[SUPPORT_USER] - the supporter name who is replying.
If selected, users will only be able to view this department if they are explicitly granted permissions.
Email notifications for new support tickets, replies to existing support tickets, and being added to an existing support ticket.
Receive email when a new support ticket message is received
The requested department could not be found.
The requested knowledge base category could not be found.
The requested knowledge base could not be found.
The requested message could not be found.
The requested ticket could not be found.
Stop notification emails from all tickets
There are no tickets matching your filters.
There are no tickets to display
This is the first message in the ticket. Deleting it will delete the whole ticket.
This user is not a member of this department.
Ticket {title} has been assigned to you

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the ticket to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the department "{department}" at {board} with email notification of new tickets or messages. You will not receive any further emails about this thread until you have read the new messages.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this department or disable all emails.
{replier} posted a new message to a department you are watching at {board}.
{replier} opened a new ticket to a department you are watching at {board}.

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the ticket to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the ticket {ticket} at {board} with email notification of new replies. You will not receive any further emails about this ticket until you have read the new messages.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this ticket or disable all emails.
{replier} replied to a ticket you are watching at {board}.
{name} created a ticket called {title}. There may be more messages after this.
{name} mentioned your message in the ticket {title}.
{name} opened a ticket called {title} for you.
{name} quoted your message in the ticket {title}.
{name} replied to the ticket {title}. There may be more messages after this.
{count} ticket(s) will be deleted when these messages are deleted.
You have already rated this ticket. Re-rating it will remove your existing rating.
You may not delete important default ticket statuses
You must enter name and email for guest.
You are not watching any departments.
You are not watching any tickets.
Are you sure you want to copy {count} message(s) to a new ticket?
Are you sure you want to delete {count} message(s)?
Are you sure you want to delete {count} ticket(s)?
Are you sure you want to merge {count} messages together?
Are you sure you want to delete {total} ticket(s)?
Are you sure you want to move {count} message(s) to a new ticket?
Are you sure you want to move {count} ticket(s)?
Are you sure you want to apply the prefix specified below to the {count} selected tickets?
Are you sure you want to stop watching all departments?
Are you sure you want to stop watching all tickets?
Are you sure you want to unwatch this department?
Are you sure you want to unwatch this ticket?
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for all departments?
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for all tickets?
Your message in the ticket {title} was copied to {target}
Your message in the ticket {title} was deleted.
Your message in the ticket {title} was edited.
Your message in the ticket {title} was moved to {target}
Your messages in ticket {source} were merged together
Your ticket {title} was moved to a different department.
The department will still be listed on the watched departments page, which can be used to list only the departments you're interested in.
Include first message in notification emails.
Use Knowledge Base Message for Suggestions
Open ticket after user submit new contact form.
When viewing the support index or department overview pages, this will be the default sort order for tickets.
Default department for open new ticket.
Default priority for open new ticket
If selected, users will need to enable receive an email when a new support ticket message is received in Email options preferences.
Show full knowledge base content at category view (using collapse instead of the link to kb).
Display submitter IP at the sidebar of support ticket view page.

With this option enabled, notification emails sent to support ticket opener will contain the full text of the message about which they are being notified. With this option disabled, they will need to visit the ticket page to read the message.
The number of characters that will be used to display the knowledge base preview in list view or category view. Use 0 to disable the preview.
The number of knowledge bases that will be listed per page.
The number of the most viewed knowledge bases. Use 0 to disabled.
The number of knowledge base suggested to a user when open new ticket. Use 0 to disable the suggest.
Use overlay with open support ticket form.
Display edit form at support ticket view page sidebar.
When the text of replies is displayed in predefined replies (bbcode), it will be trimmed to the length specified here.
CAPTCHAs help prevent spammers from open support ticket or reply to support ticket. Option CAPTCHA for Guests must enabled.
The number of tickets that will be listed per page, including on the support and department overview pages.
Use knowledge base title and message for suggestions (disabled this will use the only title).
